chunk:
Intelligent Liquid Green Oil

Brand: Intelligent

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Seed Oil, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Seed Oil, Euterpe Oleracea (Acai) Fruit Oil, Nigella Sativa (Black Cumin) Seed Oil, Cucurbita Pepo (Pumpkin) Seed Oil, DISCLOSED FRAGRANCE**,

(Raspberry) Seed Oil, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Seed Oil, Euterpe Oleracea (Acai) Fruit Oil, Nigella Sativa (Black Cumin) Seed Oil, Cucurbita Pepo (Pumpkin) Seed Oil, DISCLOSED FRAGRANCE**, [**COMPONENTS: Tanacetum Annuum (Blue Tansy) Flower Oil, Pelargonium Graveolens (Geranium) Flower Oil, Cananga Odorata (Ylang Ylang) Flower Oil, Cistus

Pepo (Pumpkin) Seed Oil, DISCLOSED FRAGRANCE**, [**COMPONENTS: Tanacetum Annuum (Blue Tansy) Flower Oil, Pelargonium Graveolens (Geranium) Flower Oil, Cananga Odorata (Ylang Ylang) Flower Oil, Cistus Ladaniferus (Cistus) Oil, Helichrysum Angustifolium (Everlasting) Flower Oil, Rosa Centifolia (Rose) Flower Extract, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Neroli)

Cananga Odorata (Ylang Ylang) Flower Oil, Cistus Ladaniferus (Cistus) Oil, Helichrysum Angustifolium (Everlasting) Flower Oil, Rosa Centifolia (Rose) Flower Extract, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Neroli) Flower Oil, Anthemis Nobilis (Chamomile) Flower Oil], Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Salicylate, Citral, Citronellol, Farnesol,

(Rose) Flower Extract, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Neroli) Flower Oil, Anthemis Nobilis (Chamomile) Flower Oil], Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Salicylate, Citral, Citronellol, Farnesol, Geraniol, Limonene, Linalool

Directions: Use: Massage 1-2 pumps onto damp face, neck and d collet .

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
